actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Jackson Hole Scenic Area in the State of Wyoming.

summary.text: Establishes the Jackson Hole Scenic Area in the State of Wyoming. Creates the Jackson Hole Scenic Area Commission to formulate a plan for the designation and acquisition of lands for such Area and to carry out the plan upon its adoption.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Jackson Hole Scenic Area in the State of Wyoming.
